config.CustomHoeDirt.name: Enable custom hoe dirt
config.CustomHoeDirt.description: Applies a custom texture to hoe dirt.
config.CustomBackgrounds.name: Enable custom backgrounds
config.CustomBackgrounds.description: Allows to customize map backgrounds, just like the island north's background.
config.CritterSpawning.name: Enable critter spawning
config.CritterSpawning.description: Enables to spawn critters in maps.
config.FishingOverrides.name: Fishing overrides
config.TreeChopEvents.name: Tree chop events
config.TreeChopEvents.description: Enables custom actions on tree chopping.
